comments.body: This verifies the fix: the pseudo topics should also be prefixed. I should have noticed before that they weren't.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +223,227 @@            applicationId + "-KTABLE-FK-JOIN-SUBSCRIPTION-REGISTRATION-0000000006-topic-fk--key",
            applicationId + "-KTABLE-FK-JOIN-SUBSCRIPTION-REGISTRATION-0000000006-topic-pk--key",
            applicationId + "-KTABLE-FK-JOIN-SUBSCRIPTION-REGISTRATION-0000000006-topic-vh--value",
            // internal topics
            applicationId + "-KTABLE-FK-JOIN-SUBSCRIPTION-REGISTRATION-0000000006-topic--key",
